title: RAW PUMPKIN SEED PESTO
directions: Combine all ingredients in a food processor and process till smooth (stopping once or twice to scrape down sides). If you like your pesto chunky, don’t process as long.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups raw pumpkin seeds – soaked for 2 hours (rinse and drain well)
1/2 cup (or more) extra virgin olive oil
3 garlic cloves – peeled and chopped small
Several drops of NuNaturals liquid stevia
1 cup PACKED fresh basil leaves (green or purple variety)
